Articles.Content:
Hello Everyone!

I have been playing Kerbal since 2013 and read the forums for a while and now I have decided to join in the community.

As a decent player, I can build and fly ships (besides SSTOs, still working on it) to planets and moons (thanks to Scott Manley's tutorials). Missions that requires return to Kerbin a manageable for the Mun, Minimus and Duna.

Welcome to the forums, CVerts. You've been playing longer than I have, so there's probably nothing I can say that'll be very helpful. If you've been lurking here, you already know that folks are ready to help with any Kerbal endeavor (the wilder, the better).  See you around!
Welcome! The Challenges section is a good place to look for new things to do and to hone your skills. I joined because I wanted to be the first person to complete the Jool-5 ISRU challenge.

"Hulllo!" 

"You`re in."
Greetings CVerts and welcome to the forums.

Welcome to the forums!

I've been playing nearly as long and also struggle with STTO planes that can carry decent cargo.
